Reviews.Title: Wrong phone
Reviews.Author: Michael Lorimer
Reviews.Content: This is a pay as you go phone (as per the serial number) and hence not suitable for adding this phone on to my Verizon plan.  Nothing was said about this in the description.  The phone itself is a good basic phone and my gripe was that I had to send it back.  The Amazon partner accepted my return and even paid for the postage.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes things work out with the simple solutions
Reviews.Author: J. Navarro ">>>>>>...
Reviews.Content: I lost my expensive, fancy, filled with feature phone one night. I needed an inexpensive replacement. This phone is like a slap to reality. Phones are only meant to be used for calling. I'm pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: THIS CELLYS SAVING ME MONEY!
Reviews.Author: ~Stoney420
Reviews.Content: I inherited a Blackberry curve from my sisters ex's cousin, I'm with verizon, I couldn't afford that xtra $30 data plan which I only used 75 mb's a month anyway, so I bought this inexpensive, I think it was like $14.95, so I reported my blackberry as lost or stolen, and switched that phone number to this phone, a little advice if you have a data plan smartphone you can no longer afford, cut spending! Switch and go back to the basics, just a plain phone! So if you're in a data plan and don't think you can find a way out do xactly as I did,call your provider, "verizon, sprint, t-mobile" Whatever..... Report the phone with the data plan you can no longer afford "Lost or Stolen" and this is what gets me........ Ya know, I for the life of me can't understand why someone would need or want a 2 inched "HAVE TO HOLD IN THE AIR 2 HOURS IN FRONT OF YOUR FACE OVERPRICED PHONE TO WATCH A DAMN NETFLIX MOVIE" The damn people in the movie are the friggin' size of my finger nail for gosh sakes!!! The technology they have today is xactly what that commercial says "PEOPLE USE "SMARTPHONES" TO DO "DUMB" THINGS".  Ridiculous.........  As for how the samsung u340 works, absolutely "NO" trouble, no dropped calls.~Stoney420

Reviews.Title: Samsung Verizon Wireless Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Jones "phone user"
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with the used phone that I purchased through Amazon.  It arrived in a timely manner, and works great.

Reviews.Title: GREAT cell phone for cheap price!
Reviews.Author: S. Knecht
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cell when I lost my Verizon cell phone and I needed some way to communicate.  Within 5 minutes of opening the box I had the phone activated and I was making calls.  Verizon InPulse (pay as you go) service offers great plans for which you only pay on the days you use it.  The service comes with unlimited Verizon mobile to mobile minutes so I was able to talk to all my Verizon clients unlimited!  The phone itself made the same great quality calls as my expensive Blackberry.  The camera works great too.  Overall you can't beat this price for such a convenient phone! 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement Cell Phone for Verizon Wireless
Reviews.Author: Michael Quinn
Reviews.Content: Great is all I can say about this Samsung cell phone. I just got mine from Smooth Sailing Cell Phones and I am so happy with my new replacement phone. Easy to activate on my account. Very fast shipping, Great price! Saved me a ton of money. I love my new phone...  GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Not What We Expected
Reviews.Author: Jinnie
Reviews.Content: Although we knew it was a used phone, we certainly did not expect the previous owner's call history to be intact!  Although the seller did not specifically claim it to be reconditioned (as he quite rudely pointed out when we returned it!), it came as a disappointing shock to find all the previous owner's personal phone numbers and data still in the phone.  Beware! Empty your phone before turning it in or selling it! You never know where it will end up!

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: The phones battery didn't work and neither did the charger. The phone was in bad shape and didn't meet my needs how I expected.

Reviews.Title: This phone never worked
Reviews.Author: SilverBack23 "it girl"
Reviews.Content: I could never get this phone to work.  it was horrible.  they sent me a replacement but that didn't work either.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: priscilla torres
Reviews.Content: This is the most terrible phone I've bought. The device was filthy it had water damage and the charger that he sent with the device was the wrong one and a generic one. When I called him he took forever to get back to me was rude about it and wanted me to ship it back without paying for his mistake and . Stop selling products if you can't back them up..

Reviews.Title: Great phone but disappointed
Reviews.Author: Frustrated!
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone since mine got destroyed, to activate on my Verizon plan. This phone is for prepaid plan ONLY, I was very dissapointed since I waited a week to get this phone, and now I still don't have one!!  Have to order again and this time make sure I get one that can be activated on my plan.  So LOOK before you LEAP, make sure you're ordering a phone that SAYS it can be activated on an active VERIZON PLAN!!  Can't say that loud enough!!

Reviews.Title: No indication of Prepaid
Reviews.Author: bryanrx
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace a broken flip phone. The product did not list anything about it being a prepaid phone. I was unable to activate it on my plan.

Reviews.Title: My forever phone
Reviews.Author: H. Webber
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for years -- since it was first made available to Verizon customers so long ago. I've never had a single issue with it. I've dropped it a hundred times with no damage. I've never had to change out the battery. And in a household full of "smart phones," mine is the only one that will reliably (1) make and receive calls, and (2) send and receive text messages. People make fun of me for using such an old-school phone, but I tell every single one of them, "You will pry this phone from my cold dead fingers."Other perks: It's tiny -- even by flip-phone standards. It fits almost anywhere, and you can tuck it into your pocket without fear of breaking it or dropping it into the toilet. And when you're really mad, you can slam it closed for emphasis. Try doing that with a smart phone :)I've had great luck with accessories -- car charger, wall charger, hands-free unit, etc. Inevitably, the phone outlasts the accessories. Based on my experience, I'd say purchase it with confidence!

Reviews.Title: Samsung does it again...  Great Phone!  Clear Voice and nice price.
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I just love this phone.  Samsung makes great phones and this one is fantastic for its price.Easily activated on my Verizon post paid account.Very Nice looking phone and nice features by Samsung!GREAT...  AAA+++

Reviews.Title: Only use as last resort
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I needed a new phone and had owned this exact model in the past and it was a very sturdy phone. It was just a cheap place holder for the time being, so I didn't need anything special. When I received the phone, it had about 75% battery, yet all night in the charger and it dropped to 50%. Seeing as how it had a descent charge when I got it, I knew it could hold one, yet the aftermarket adapter they sent with it was defective. What I can see from this is they don't check to make sure that ALL contents are in, at a minimum, descent working order.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Lynn Sherman
Reviews.Content: Fast service .  All was as expected.  Perfect for my parents. Works with Verizon plan with no issues. Good phone

Reviews.Title: decent flip phone
Reviews.Author: kateshefall
Reviews.Content: If you are a frequent 'texter' this phone is NOT for youSometimes the phone has poor reception and sometimes it receives texts on a time delay (I got 40 texts one morning that spanned from 7 previous days of not receiving the texts).The phone has trouble dealing with texts from smart phones - such as group texts or picture textssometimes I had voicemails but no missed callsThis is my american phone since i live elsewhere and its good for the basics, after a while i told me to call instead of texting me and the phone was much happier. Its just an old phone.

Reviews.Title: great little phone!
Reviews.Author: Terry Siegel
Reviews.Content: Works great - excellent phone for the money!  I bought 2 - one as a spare and one for a friend.  She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: buying a good used phone?
Reviews.Author: harry mcfarland
Reviews.Content: 1 week after the purchase,an activation , the screen went clear, blank, stopped working. so ended up just throwing the phone away

Reviews.Title: Great phone if you don't want a data plan
Reviews.Author: Retired Tire Engineer "Drew"
Reviews.Content: Good phone for those of us who like our cheap "grandfathered" cell plan. I had available a smart phone to use after my old "dumb" phone died, but I would have had to upgrade to a much more expensive plan than the one I've been hanging onto for many years now.  This phone has good battery life and is clear when you talk on it.  It has a camera, but it's a pretty lousy one.

Reviews.Title: False advertisement
Reviews.Author: Tipsuree Poovaviranon
Reviews.Content: ZERO STARS really. It was a deceiving picture. The phone is extremely old and the battery did notLast at all. Not happy with it.  Am going to return it.  False advertising

Reviews.Title: Solid Easy To Use Phone For Seniors
Reviews.Author: Martin M.
Reviews.Content: If you want a simple functional phone with big keyboard letters and easy to read screen, this is your phone. Replacement chargers are getting hard to find but they are cheap.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Bee
Reviews.Content: I got this phone three days after I purchased it. It looks brand spankin' new and I love it! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: joe mama
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for I paid twenty dollars. It works great could not ask for a better cheap phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Ruthie Bellamy
Reviews.Content: More than satisfied with the condition of the phone and the customer service I received when I thought there might be a problem activating phone was great!  I would definately recommend purchasing from this company and do plan on again making a purchase if I am in need of something they provide.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: Angela Y.
Reviews.Content: My bf just needed a basic replacement phone until contract is up. It works well and he likes it. Simple, no frills, but good product.

Reviews.Title: Great Vendor!!!
Reviews.Author: LeftClique
Reviews.Content: Recellulartoo was great to work with.  There was a problem with my order - not their fault - and they bent over backwards to help me out and get another phone to me right away.  Great service!  The Samsung U340 is my favorite cell phone - the best - small, rounded, light weight, you never know it's in your pocket.  It's fantastic for rough work environments - I'm a carpenter - and that matters, big time.  It's a flip, so the key pad is protected, but the best touch is a little flap that keeps dirt out of the charging port.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Cell phone
Reviews.Author: John Engle
Reviews.Content: The phone was clean, worked well, I neded to replace a broken phone  before the contract was up allowing me to get a new one.

Reviews.Title: Samsung phone
Reviews.Author: Dana Mitchell
Reviews.Content: The battery life is not good at all.  It goes down quickly with very little use.  It is very inconvenient.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: Mayor2102
Reviews.Content: The ad did not stste that it was a prepaid phone and am now in the process of trying to return it.

Reviews.Title: Phone for Mom
Reviews.Author: KyBear
Reviews.Content: The phone is for my mother who is in a nursing home. I was looking for something with large numbers and easy to use. She keeps shutting the sound off (which isn't helpful) because it is on the side right where someone would hold the phone.The charger is such a strange fit, that I even had to take it to the Verizon store to see if I could get a new one and they don't carry that style anymore. He did get it in and adjusted the opening with a nail file to help the fit.Not what I wanted or expected.

Reviews.Title: easy to use and safe.  easy to carry
Reviews.Author: Xiaobin Li
Reviews.Content: easy to use and safe.  easy to carry.  Don't waist money to use smart phone.  no no no no no no

Reviews.Title: It's Okay.
Reviews.Author: D. Rode "Bubba"
Reviews.Content: Know the phone is not state of the art and thats okay.  But received the phone with no instruction book and a used charger (that does work).  Not sure about the phone.  The keypad seems to be spastic occasionally, but overall; it'll do.  Not likely i would get this same phone again, but would still opt for a flip phone.  Don't need all the bells and whistles.  It's meant to be a phone and used as such.

Reviews.Title: exactly as I expected it, & on-time
Reviews.Author: Dr L
Reviews.Content: What can I say -- I got what I ordered, when I expected to, and I'm using it without a glitch. Thanks

Reviews.Title: A good capable phone.
Reviews.Author: Island Boy "Island Boy"
Reviews.Content: It is a nice phone, easy to carry and with plenty of capability for me.  A good value as I bought it used.  My only problem is I wish the ring was louder because I sometimes don't hear it.

Reviews.Title: Screen
Reviews.Author: weavesatopms
Reviews.Content: The screen on this phone does not stay lit for very long, I have to keep hitting the button to get it to light up again.  Its a pain when you are trying to do something.

Reviews.Title: Good value - Great phone
Reviews.Author: Nina Hildebrandt
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my husband who just wants to make and receive calls and he has loved it. He started using it as soon as it was charged and has had no complaints.  Not fancy but just what he needed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Verizon Prepaid Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Holcombe
Reviews.Content: This phone is most likely suitable for the people who aren't tech-savvy, young kids as a first phone, or seniors. I had this phone as my first phone in 4th grade 3 years ago, and its features are very limited. The battery life isn't good, but it's probably because I texted a lot when I had it, averaging about 50-60 texts per day. I had mine on a post-paid account on a FamilyShare plan with my parents, who were not knowledgeable on the topic of phones at that time. They weren't into email on the phone, or the ability to access the Internet. They wanted to get me a cheap phone that was modeartely durable because I used to break a lot of electronics accidentally. Seeing as I was begging for a phone, and they saw it was free with a 2-yr contract, they bought 3 of then for the 3 of us. When my contract was up at the beginning of last year, I bought a Chocolate Touch, because the plain flip phone was kind of uncool. So, it's probably better for older people or young kids who don't use their phones a lot, because I used to use mine a lot, and it drained the battery pretty quickly. Many more parents are making kids get phones like this now, seeing as Verizon charges $9.99 or $29.99 for the data plan on most phones. If you don't plan to use the phone heavily, email, or use the Internet, then a phone like this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: I guess I got what I deserved buying a new, but out of date, phone. Total crap. Had to trade out the battery it came with for another supposedly new one, and it sucked as well. It's sitting in a drawer if anyone wants it - just pay the shipping - a couple of bucks.

Reviews.Title: Verizon pre-pay phone sucks
Reviews.Author: Ralph Henderson "climber"
Reviews.Content: This was supposed to be an upgrade from my original pre-pay phone (has a camera which I wanted), but it sucks.  There are fewer options and the camera takes pics you can't use, because of the low quality. I think Verizon would love to get rid of it's pre-pay program and hence the crappy products and options.  They are going to lose me as a customer and many others.  If you offer a service, make it quality; otherwise you're just wasting time and frustrating customers.  I'll switch brands when I get a new phone. This one is the WORST cell phone I've ever owned unless all you want is calls...and even then, the rates are crazy (all pre-pay services I've found are way high).

ProductInfo.Features:
VGA-quality camera
Advanced speech recognition
Speakerphone
Multimedia messaging
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung U340 Cell Phone (Verizon)
